title: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Today we will present to you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream. The horse is a symbol of leadership and leadership and is characterized by speed and stability. It is a means of transportation from one place to another. Many people want to own an Arabian horse because of its great status, and seeing horses in a dream is one of the visions that people wonder about. Many people, so today we will show you the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream in this article in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of horses in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing horses in a dream indicates sustenance and goodness that the dreamer gains in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a horse, This means that he will find a new job and fulfill his desires. Perhaps seeing horses in a dream indicates that the dreamer will work in a place whose owner is pious and righteous. If the dreamer sees a horse with wings in a dream, this means that he will obtain property or a high position in society. Seeing a horse running In a dream, the dreamer is riding on his back, indicating that the dreamer is on the path of sin. Interpretation of seeing horses in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees horses in a dream indicates the great wealth and goodness that this girl will acquire in reality. If an unmarried girl sees a horse with wings, this It means that this girl will have an excellent position in society or that she will find a new job. If an unmarried girl sees horses in a dream, this means that her marriage to a good person is approaching. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying horses, this means that she will have The opportunity to travel or be promoted at work. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees horses in a dream, this indicates the wealth and kindness that she will obtain in reality. And if a married woman sees in a dream horses with defects, such as having one eye, then this does not mean It bodes well, and warns of moderation in spending, because she will be afflicted with extreme poverty. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with horses means that she will give birth to a child distinguished by beauty, piety, and justice, whether this child is male or female. If a pregnant woman sees a horse with long hair in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to just and righteous offspring. Also, seeing horses in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her birth will be easy and free of problems. Interpretation of a horse in a dream for a man: If an unmarried man sees horses in a dream, this means that he will soon marry a loyal girl with a good nature. If one sees in a dream that a horse Bites him or hits him, this means that the dreamer is committing sins in reality. If a married man sees himself falling from a horse, this indicates the death or illness of his wife. But if a man sees horse milk in a dream, this indicates that he will have great benefit and great influence. In life. If a man sees himself turning into a horse in a dream, this indicates that he is distinguished by pride, strength of character, and dignity. Other interpretations of seeing horses in a dream by Ibn Siriniri, the scholar Ibn Si

title: Hitting the mother in a dream

preview.html: Therefore, in this article we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a mother being beaten in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a mother beating an unmarried girl in a dreamWhen an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her mother is generally beating her in the dream. This vision is one of the good ideas for this girl because this girl heard news Good. This enables the girl to achieve what she wants in life without fatigue, exhaustion, or extra effort. The story of an unmarried girl who saw her mother hitting her with a stick while she was sleeping. Dream interpretation scholars interpreted this vision to mean that this girl will marry someone very close to them. In Most likely it will be either her cousin or her uncle and she will live a happy married life with him. About an unmarried girl who dreams that her mother is beating her, but this girl does not feel any pain from her mother hitting her. Evidence that this girl is doing some actions and habits that her mother does not like or approve of. Exactly. Often, among these habits is spending money without any benefit. As for the unmarried girl who sees her mother beating her and running away from her in a dream. This vision is a sign of this girl’s strength in dealing with the difficult situations she is going through and her possession of an ideal personality And very close to her relationship with her Lord Almighty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a husband hitting his wife. Interpretation of seeing a mother hitting a married woman in a dream. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is hitting her children in general in a dream. It is one of the dreams that carries good connotations for this woman and her children. Often It appears that this woman, her children, and her husband will have a good, bright, distinguished, and happy future. About a married woman who sees her mother-in-law beating her husband in a dream. This vision is a sign that this woman’s husband will reach the highest levels of success, honor, and honour, and will receive the thanks and praise of all people and all the leaders of the state. As for the married woman who sees her mother beating her severely in a dream, this is evidence of alleviating this woman’s financial situation, getting rid of all the financial problems that she and her husband are suffering from, and transforming her from a low standard of living to a much higher standard of living. Seeing a married woman arguing loudly with her mother in a dream, But her mother beats her. This vision is evidence that this woman commits many abominations and sins and treats people with great arrogance and selfishness, and if she does not stay away from these actions, her life will be completely destroyed. Interpretation of seeing a mother beating her in a dream for a divorced woman When a divorced woman sees in her dream that her mother is beating her in general The dream. Evidence that this woman will gain many benefits in the coming period and that she will feel completely satisfied with all her circumstances and that she will gain many life-changing experiences. A vision of an absolute woman stroking her children in her sleep. This vision is a sign that Almighty God will bless this woman with her children. It will be The best support for her in her life and that her children will be throughout her life and a source of happiness for her. As for the divorced woman who sees her mother hitting her in a dream with a wooden object. This vision is evidence that this woman regrets the decision to divorce her husband.

title: Interpretation of a dream about artichokes by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of artichokes in a dream, from happy dreams, indicates the arrival of good or ample and abundant food. There are many nutrients that the body needs, and in this article we will show you the interpretation of a dream about artichokes. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating artichokes, this means that the date of this girl’s marriage to a good young man who has a high status in society and seeing himself eating fresh artichokes in the dream appears. Goodness, even if he is single, this indicates his marriage, because it shows the achievement of goals and ambitions. Interpretation of a dream about artichokes by Ibn Sirin. If you see an artichoke in a dream, this means that you will hear a lot of happy news that comes after a long sadness. If the owner of the insight is in an emotional relationship and has a view of Spinach in Manama, it means that he will reach love and fulfill this desire, God Almighty. Dreaming about artichokes in a dream If the vision is that someone peels an artichoke, it means that bad news is coming or unpleasant news will happen. If one sees in a dream that he is eating an artichoke, This means that this person has patience and good advice. Seeing an artichoke in a dream may indicate disappointment towards people close to them. Interpretation of a dream about an artichoke for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars have explained different interpretations for the girl who sees the artichoke in a dream, which are: Seeing an artichoke in a dream for a single woman Married means that her life will change for the better and an important change in the level of work. This vision for a single woman shows a great passion for work and seeks to change her life significantly for the better in the coming years. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating artichokes, this means that the date of this girl’s marriage is from A good young man who has a high status in society. Dreaming of artichokes in a dream: If an unmarried woman is in distress and sees in her dream that she is eating green artichokes, this indicates that this trial will end, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about artichokes for pregnant women. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating artichokes, this indicates On the extent of the love that exists between her and her husband. Seeing a green artichoke in a dream explains that for a married woman, the date of birth is approaching and that the birth process will be easy, God Almighty. Seeing a green artichoke in a dream for a pregnant woman may indicate that the newborn will be a male. He enjoys excellent health and well-being. If a pregnant woman eats an artichoke in a dream and its taste is unpleasant, this means for her that there are some problems that she will face during pregnancy. Dreaming of an artichoke in a dream If a pregnant woman sees a green artichoke and its color is pale, this means that she will feel pain during pregnancy And childbirth.Interpretation of a dream about a green artichoke in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have explained different interpretations regarding seeing a green artichoke in a dream, which are: Dreaming about an artichoke in a dream If a businessman sees a green artichoke or a merchant sees a field of artichokes, this means the continuation of wealth and influence. The vision indicates Fresh green artichokes in a dream indicate wealth and that the dreamer is forbidden

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dagger in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dagger in a dream by Al-Osaimi Interpretation of dreams Dagger in a dream If the dreamer has it, this indicates a lot of money that he gets. If a person sees in a dream that he removes a dagger from his hand, this indicates victory and getting rid of enemies in a short time. Interpretation of dreams about a dagger in a single woman’s dream The dream of a girl carrying a dagger in her hand is a sign of the huge money that she will get. The dream of a golden dagger is a sign of marriage in the near future. As for the dream of wearing armor and carrying a dagger with him, it indicates the righteous husband with whom she is blessed. Interpretation of a dream about a dagger in a pregnant woman’s dream If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a dagger in her hand, this indicates the abundance of wealth and goodness that she and her husband will acquire. However, if she sees that she is giving her husband a dagger in a dream, this indicates a lot of problems and severe confusion. But if she sees herself stabbing someone with a dagger in a dream, this indicates her desire to talk to someone. Interpretation of a dream about a dagger for a married woman If a married woman sees that she is pregnant with a dagger, this shows food and a lot of money in her hand. However, if she sees in her dream that she is taking the dagger From his mother, this indicates an improvement in her situation and the stability that prevails in her. Interpretation of a dream about a dagger for a man Seeing a young man carrying a dagger in a dream means sincere repentance. If he is seen carrying a dagger to fight enemies, this indicates his aggressive nature. As for a man’s dream of a dagger shoe decorated with cheerful colors, this shows abundant and plentiful food. If he sees a dagger in the hand of someone he does not know, this indicates negative thoughts. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

If he sees a dagger in the hand of someone he does not know, then this It indicates negative thoughts. title: Seeing a dead child come back to life in a dream

preview.html: On the contrary, this does not cause fear and anxiety because this vision has many good interpretations, which we will explain to you in this article. Interpretation of seeing a dead child return to life in one dream: An unmarried girl who dreams of a dead child returns to life. Expressing that she will get married in the next few days and that Her marriage will be successful and happy. Also, this vision could be an expression that this girl is doing many wrong things. They should stop doing these things. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is hugging a dead child. Evidence that there is a great source of livelihood that she will receive. The girl soon. Interpretation of seeing a dead child return to life in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams that her son has died and returned to life. This is evidence that he must beware of the presence of someone who hates him very much, and God knows best. But when a married woman sees that the dead child is her daughter. It is Evidence that she will achieve a lot of profits and gains in her next life. It could also mean that a married woman who sees a dead child coming back to life will be harmed, and God knows best. But when she sees herself taking something from a dead child. It is something that expresses great sustenance in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a dead child coming back to life in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who dreams of a dead child coming back to life is evidence that she feels fear, anxiety, and tension for her child, as well as expressing fear of childbirth. When she sees a dead child in a dream, this means that she is very afraid for her child. located in her stomach. But when a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is crying loudly for a dead child, and he comes back to life. This is evidence that he will get rid of all the problems he is facing in the current period. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about a child vomiting Interpretation of seeing a dead child coming back Life in a divorced woman’s dream: A divorced woman sees in a dream a dead child coming back to life. This is evidence that he is going through huge problems and issues. As for when she sees a divorced woman dead, it is something that expresses that the problems that this woman is going through have not ended and that she is afraid of this issue. It is also He passes the final vision of Lutfi's dead, and returns to life again. About getting rid of the problems and battles that this woman suffers from. When one sees a dead child, he comes back to life. Evidence that he will marry again but this marriage will be happy. It brings her psychological comfort and confidence Interpretation of seeing a dead child come back to life in a dream for a young man. When a young man dreams that he is embracing a dead child, he comes back to life. Evidence that he has good luck in life. Also, a young man can express a dream about embracing a dead child who comes back to life. That you will get married soon, I swear to God. I know. Seeing a young man taking something from a dead child is something that expresses the great livelihood that the dreamer will obtain. Also, seeing a young man hugging his mother from Menoufia is evidence that he will have great happiness in the future. See also: Seeing a male child being carried in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a vision A dead child comes back to life in a man's dream when he sees a man

title: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a man being cut in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Cutting off a leg is one of the most difficult things that can happen to a person and one of the most unpleasant dreams. If a person sees his leg cut off during his sleep, this indicates many indicators, whether for a man or for single people. Or divorced, married, or pregnant. His interpretation of the haircut on the left leg. In this article we will explain the difference between them. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced man in a dream. A man cutting his knee for a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man in a dream. Seeing legs and arms open and the symbol of the left and right leg. Interpretation of cutting a man. The rare visions that we have seen in our dreams, but this does not prevent them. It has many meanings and interpretations, and this is what I learned in detail through the man’s interpretation of the story of a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a leg according to Ibn Sirina. Explaining that seeing someone cut off in a dream indicates an unpleasant vision is a sign of losing money or losing someone close to me. A dream indicates Penetrating a man in a dream means losing half of the money, not all of it, and it may indicate divorce and estrangement from the family. My legs were cut off in my dreams and sorrows, evidence of the devastation that occurred behind me. Seeing severed legs in a dream means that the dreamer lost his father, which makes him very sad for himself. A dream about a man’s artery being amputated indicates failure of the project, resignation, lack of money, and bad luck. See also: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a man cutting off a woman’s vessel. Dreaming of a man cutting off in an ordinary woman’s dreams indicates that an ineffective man will appear next to her and she must be careful when choosing. Seeing a girl cutting off her leg in a dream means that the person is traveling and recovering from an illness. Interrupting the dreams of two people in a dream is evidence of a major financial crisis, but because of her wisdom and prudence, it quickly ended and disappeared. A single girl dreams that a man’s fingers are open, which indicates that she will become A very important person and you will receive a great honor. Dreaming of seeing one’s legs cut off in a woman’s dream indicates that she wants to get rid of problems and worries. See also: Interpretation of a dream of cutting off fingers in a dream by Al-Nabulsi in detail. Interpretation of a dream of cutting off a married manExplain that seeing a man bending his knees in a married woman’s dream It means that she is in a bad psychological state due to many problems and disagreements. Breaking a man’s dream in a married woman’s dream proves that her husband will increase the pain and accumulated debt by borrowing to pay off the debt he owes. Seeing a married woman’s husband cutting off his leg in a dream means that this can improve Financial situation and finding a new job that can be successful. Seeing a man paralyzed because of a married woman seeking in a dream means that she needs someone to support her, support her, and help her in her life. Dreaming about legs being cut off in a dream can indicate separation of a husband, whether it is the death of the husband or divorce. Because there are many disagreements and problems between spouses. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a man in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. title: Learn about the interpretation of hitting a married woman in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream of hitting a married woman in the face

preview.html: Beating is one of the first things that causes discomfort and a bad psychological state for any person, and seeing a beating in a dream has many connotations and meanings, and today, through the online dream interpretation site, we will point out the interpretations. Beating with a stick in a dream for a married woman. Beating with a stick in a dream for a married woman. Beating a married woman in The dream is a sign that she is facing many problems and difficulties in her life at the present time, and most of these problems go back to the past, so she is trying to fix them. But if she is currently suffering from many differences between her and her husband, then being beaten in a dream indicates that the problems will increase and she will think Seriously in making the decision to divorce for the sake of her children. As for the woman who dreams that her husband beats her and does not feel any pain, this is evidence of the intensity of her husband’s love for her, and he tries all the time to protect her and meet all her demands. Fahd Al-Osaimi believes that this is beating in a woman’s dream. A married woman is evidence of pregnancy. Beating a married woman with a stick in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin mentioned that hitting a married woman’s stomach is evidence that she will obtain a lot of money in the coming period, in addition to that her life in general will be filled with goodness and blessings. Beating her stomach and back in a dream A married woman is a sign of the approaching pregnancy, and God Almighty also blesses her with good offspring. If a married woman sees herself being beaten by the people around her, this is evidence of her frequent presence. She is envious and hates her life, in addition to that they are constantly seeking the failure of her marital relationship. A strong blow to her back is evidence that she will gain benefit and goodness in the coming days. As for someone who dreams of being hit with sharp objects, the dream indicates that he will be exposed to great troubles in the coming period. Being caned in a working married woman’s dream is a sign of promotion at work, leading to an important position. Beating a pregnant woman with a stick in a dream. Violent and brutal beating of a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to children characterized by courage and good qualities. Childbirth will not be easy and will be mixed with a lot of pain and pain. Beating a pregnant woman while she is sleeping leads to a caesarean section, but if the pregnant woman sees that traces of beating appear all over her body, this is evidence that she has committed a sin and disobedience and she must repent before it is too late. When a pregnant woman sees herself She is being beaten by her husband, this is evidence of worsening disputes and problems between her and her husband, and it will be difficult for them to continue their life together, so divorce will be considered. The husband beats his pregnant wife in a dream, but the beating is not painful, good news that she will give birth to a very beautiful girl, as the dream symbolizes. To overcome all obstacles and problems. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. The most important interpretations of hitting in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of hitting a woman in the face

title: Interpretation of seeing cats being kicked out of the house in a dream for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cats being expelled from the house in a dream for a single woman. It is one of the animals that has innocent and beautiful features, and many people love to play with it and put it in their homes, but they cannot develop their predatory and brutal type. They have many shapes and types, and many girls love to have them. They see them and most of them see them in their dreams, and this vision is one of the visions that brings good and evil together and differs from one case to another, and in this matter we will explain each dream with different facts. To learn the interpretations, follow this article with us. The interpretation of seeing cats being chased from the house in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing cats being chased from the house in a dream and their color was white, indicates the viewer’s inability to think properly, because she will lose very good opportunities. If she is an unmarried girl Dreaming of chasing colorful cats, this is a sign that she will find a new job in the coming days. An unmarried dreamer who chases cats in his dream indicates that she will enter a new phase in her life and will feel happy and comfortable in it. Seeing an unmarried girl chasing white cats in a dream means that she has many It is one of the bad moral qualities that make people avoid her and do not want to talk to her. Whoever sees in her dream that she is kicking out a white cat while she is already engaged, this is a sign of her separation from the person to whom she was engaged. Interpretation of seeing cats being kicked out of the house in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing cats going out From the house in a dream for an unmarried woman has many meanings and connotations, and some scholars and jurists have talked about it, including the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing a single woman chasing white cats with colored eyes during her sleep. This means that she is far from God Almighty, and has committed many sins, transgressions, and forbidden things, and she must stop them immediately, and hasten to repent so that she does not obtain her reward in the afterlife. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cats being expelled from the home for unmarried women because of their excessive meowing, as evidence of their ability to Changing many things in their lives will improve their living conditions. Interpretation of seeing a cat being chased from the house in a dream for single women. Interpretation of seeing a cat being chased from the house in a dream for an unmarried woman and killing it, this indicates that she will feel that she is suffering from the problems and crises that she will face in the coming days. If an unmarried girl sees Herself chasing calm white cats in her dream, this is an undesirable vision because it keeps good people away from her life. Seeing an unmarried woman chasing away black cats in a dream symbolizes that she is dealing with evil people who corrupt her morals and she must stay away from them so that she does not become like them. The vision One dreamer being chased by mischievous cats in her dream is a sign that she is trying to stay away from things that bother her and upset her mood. Seeing a cat leaving the house in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a cat leaving the house in a dream for an unmarried woman, this symbolizes that she has bad qualities, including treatment people in a m

title: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, our article today from the encyclopedia about the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. There are many opinions put forward by jurists and scholars, about the different cases in which you see a fish or it is a warning that something will happen, so we will talk in the following lines about the meaning of this dream, for this follow us. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream: In Ibn Sirin’s general interpretation, we find that fish can indicate earning a living, hearing good news, giving birth to a child, or obtaining spoils and money, but sometimes it can indicate that a person will be sad or hated. There is Many other cases of interpretation of seeing fish in a dream, such as: If one sees in a dream that he is eating salty fish, this indicates stress and fatigue, and the opposite may be true. If one sees himself catching a small fish, this indicates the death of grace. Whoever sees Himself during a dream while he is catching a big fish, this indicates the coming of great benefit and abundant goodness. If the dreamer sees that he is catching a brown fish and this person will participate in one of the tasks in reality, then this indicates the emergence of success and reconciliation between all partners and may also indicate marriage in the future. Nearby. Whoever sees himself in a dream looking at the bottom of the water, and sees a dead fish, this means that this cooperation and interest that he has gathered with one of the people will not be achieved, and he will not get it, and he will. Unable to fulfill his desires. If one sees himself fishing in a cloudy pond, this means that the vision is invalid and does not bring any good to the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in the dream a fish in his sleeping area or on his bed, this means that he is sick, in the event that this person A fisherman. Whoever sees four fish in a dream, this means that the man will marry four women, and whoever sees more than this number, means that he obtains spoils, money, or food. General interpretations of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees that he is fishing from land, It means that he has committed many sins, including adultery, and he must take the necessary precautions. If a person sees himself looking at a large fish at the bottom of the water, lake, or river, and he picks it up and eats from it whatever he wants, this indicates that the person has acquired treasure, abundant wealth, and money. If the dreamer sees that he is looking into the mouth of a fish, this means that he will become wealthy and have a lot of money, and it will come through his wife or he may have a son. Whoever sees fish in his house or in his bed, this indicates that something bad will happen, and if this person is sick, this indicates something bad and an increase in pain and suffering. Whoever sees in a dream a swamp or sea and finds a whale or fish in it, this indicates that this person He will be affected by something and may be unjustly imprisoned. If a person finds himself fishing, this may indicate excessive sadness, hatred, and anxiety. Whoever is found eating a dead fish, this indicates that the matter is not complete. Whoever observes himself catching fish from clean, pure water, this indicates kindness to Al-Basir and his son, if he has a son, but if he fishes in salt water, the opposite will happen. Whoever finds a soul

title: Interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream by Ibn Sirin shows the dreamer’s desire to change his priorities and promises to get rid of problems and end arguments, in addition to the stability he will have in the coming period, while only cutting off his ends. Success and excellence appear in studies. Interpretation of a haircut in a dream for a married woman: To see a well-groomed haircut in a woman’s dream indicates getting rid of all the problems and conflicts that were present in one’s life. It also indicates stability and living with peace of mind and calm after the state of extreme anxiety and fear that she experienced. But If she sees in her dream, she sees that she cuts her hair, and if she does not find herself well or organized, then this is a warning of the misery and sadness that she will live in. Moreover, seeing her cutting her hair is an annoying scene that does not bode well. And seeing the hair ends is a sign of success and excellence that she will enjoy in the future. Life, the great happiness that she will return to, and the lasting love between her and her husband. Cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried woman. This vision shows that this girl is carrying a lot of problems and is unable to bear this responsibility alone and is unable to find a solution to all the problems she is suffering from. But if He saw her cutting her hair for a new hairstyle. This leads her to her great desire to change and make a situation better than it is now. This vision could be a sign that this girl will get rid of the major emotional problems she is living in. It is also a sign of her entering into a new romantic relationship It will make her happy and bring joy to her heart. It is also evidence that this girl has entered a new stage in which she is trying to achieve her goals and achieve her ambitions at this time. Interpretation of seeing hair cut in a dream for a woman: This vision indicates a change in work conditions for the better. It also indicates the birth of a woman, and bless her. Janine soon. It is also evidence that this woman cares a lot about her appearance. This vision indicates the death of worry and sadness that the dreamer is experiencing and the elimination of all the problems and disputes that he was exposed to during the previous period. It also indicates renewed energy, and emerging from a difficult period, and feeling of despair and frustration in peace. Without any loss. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a salon: Seeing a barber shop, and this leads to the disappearance and end of all sorrows and problems, and the removal of obstacles that existed in the dreamer’s life. But if the wife cuts her husband’s hair, this explains the dreamer’s nourishment with abundant good supplies and abundance and reaping great benefits. But if the dreamer He is the one who cuts his hair, this indicates that he is going through a difficult period. After a major crisis in his life. This vision shows that the dreamer is a person who always seeks to do good, help, and communicate with others around him. See also: - Interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream for a single and married person. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream for a man. Seeing hair in a man’s dream means that He makes new decisions and removes the worries and problems that he suffered from in his life. It indicates the size and quantity of hair that the dreamer has done. Story of...
